page.title: 18THE LIFE OF A DISTRICT NURSE
page.content:
THE{DISTRICT NURSE}OF THE{OATHLAW AREA STARTS HER ROUNDS EARLY IN THE MORNING.THE FIRST PEOPLE SHE CALLS ON ARE PEOPLE WHO NEED BATHING OR WHO NEED HELP IN GETTING DRESSED.HER JOB IS A FULL TIME ONE. SHE FINISHES HER WORK AT{5pm}AND WHEN SHE GETS HOME SHE COOKS THE TEA FOR HER FAMILY AND CATCHES UP ON THE WASHING AND IRONING. IN HER SPARE_TIME SHE LIKES TO{KNIT AND{READ.}HOWEVER MOST OF HER FREE TIME IS SPENT WITH HER{HUSBAND}AND{TWO {DAUGHTERS. SHE HAS NO PETS OTHER THAN A GOLDFISH. THE LIFE OF THE DISTRICT NURSE IS AN EXTREMELY BUSY ONE INDEED!
{
